name: Cave Escaper
description:
A free gameboy game I made for Ludwig's Foddian Game Jam>

This is a real gameboy game that can run on real gameboy hardware!

https://itch.io/jam/ludwig-2021

Github repository of the game here: https://github.com/Float-pixel/Cave-Escaper

Made with GB Studio and Tiled

Controls:
Arrow keys : dpad
Z & X : A & B
Enter: Start
